1.content: Okay, so you wake up as a girl, but how old?
1.title: Age

11.content:
As who do you wake up?

-Kelly Reynolds, your half sister.
Lives with your mother and stepfather.
You haven't had any contact for 7 years.

-Amy Taylor, your sister's bff.
Lives with her parents and younger brother. Your girlfriend Ann is her older sister.

-Penny Masters, your sister's other bff.
Lives with her parents and 1 of her older brothers. Her oldest brother is your bestfriend.

- Marcella Coins.
Lives with her widowed father and younger sister . Her mother died after giving birth to Marcella's younger sister.

choices: Show up at home greeting her with a kiss and hug.
Seduce you sister in Marcella's body.
114.content:
You wake up before anyone has come into the room, as you look at yourself for the first time in the mirror you see in the reflection Marcella Coins, she is a friend of your sister, as you think you remember that your sister stopped hanging around Marcella when they first kissed and your sister wanted to take it further but Marcella wasn't sure about where it was going and so your sister stopped hanging out with her.

Now though, you are Marcella and you think it would be hot to rekindle the spark between them .
114.title: Marcella

1143.content: There are plenty of ideas what you could do now, but you don’t want to be a 13-year-old girl. You also need to find out what was happening and why you suddenly are Marcella….
1143.title: More ideas with Marcella's body.

115.content:
You woke up slowly, first hearing the 'beep' 'beep' of the monitoring machines and then the relieved sigh of your younger sister, Kelly. You moaned, slowly opening your eyes to see that Kelly had been crying. She managed a weak smile upon catching your eye.

"What happened?" Still groggy, you demanded. "Where am I?"

"There was a gas explosion near the restaurant you took me for my thirteenth birthday." Gently, Kelly explained. "You are in the hospital where the doctors fixed you up."

"How bad is it?" Worried, you asked.

You tried to sit up but Kelly pushed you down, shaking her head. She winced catching your questioning look. "The doctors tried an experimental procedure on you; dad signed off on it." Softly, Kelly explained. "It used nanites, single celled machines to literally rebuild your body." She teared up, any other method and you would not be here."

"What...?!" Startled, you asked.

"The nanites did a great job fixing your body but there was a glitch." She winced. "You might want to prepare yourself for a shock."

She pulled the covers off of you to reveal you looked exactly like...
115.title: Experimental procedure.

choices: make your mind match your body.
let your mind adapt to your body.
1153.content:
You freaked seeing two orbs on your chest under your hospital gown. Looking under the gown confirmed your fears and mom handed you a small mirror. Shaking, you looked into the mirror and saw the face of an attractive thirteen year old girl where you were used to seeing a handsome young man. "What happened?!" Frightened, you demanded. "Did someone hit the wrong switch or something?!"

"In a matter of speaking... yes." Wincing, mom replied. "As I explained, the procedure was experimental. The doctors had a lot of programing to run before they used it on you and forgot to set a specific gender." She sighed. "The nanites rebuilt you as a girl."

"Fortunately and unfortunately, the nanites were only programed to rebuild your body." Wincing, Kelly added. "So you are now a teen girl with a man's mind."

"There is talk of resetting your mind to match your new body." Gently, mom said. "Only your father is fighting them on this as they had already made one monumental mistake with the new procedure."

"Don't I get a say in this?!" Startled, you demanded. "I may look thirteen but I have the mind and maturity of an adult!"

"You also suffered a traumatic medical malpractice incident." Serious, mom said. "There is a concern that your panic may lead to irrational decisions."

This left you speechless as dad finally walked in with a small team of doctors. "I am sorry, Kevin." Firmly but kindly, dad said. "However, given the situation, I feel I must make the decisions on your behalf. The doctors and I are in agreement that the best course of action is to..."
1153.title: Yourself as a teenage girl.

11532.content:
You agree to this, give your mind time to adapt to this crazy situation and to your new much younger and female body. If any possible you don’t want to get brainwashed or so. You want to keep your mind and identity. You promise to be able to scope with it.
The doctors told tomorrow after a final check you could leave the hospital. They also connected your parents with some agency they work with to get some new ID card and legal papers for you, since you will need them….
11532.title: let your mind adapt to your body.

115321.content:
The following morning, you were discharged from the hospital with a new name and a new identification. You were not comfortable with being legally Kelly's twin sister, Keven but you were grateful not to have to get used to a new more feminine name. Everything happened too fast for you which made you glad dad took the reigns when it came to your care and legal battles with the hospital. Mom and Kelly tried their best but you winced at the knee length black skater skirt and ivory blouse with knee high socks and black flats. Still, you begrudgingly put them on after mom helped you get into your first bra which brought issues of its own.

"I feel caged in this thing." Grumbling, you muttered.

Mom and Kelly giggled. "You'll get used to it." Bemused, Kelly said.

"Trust us, that wonder bra is a real back saver." To Kelly's nod, mom said. "Only this is just the beginning."

"What do you mean?" Taken aback, I asked.

"Well, you are going to need a new wardrobe for starters." Smiling, Kelly said. "That and you are going to need to learn how to hold yourself as a girl."

Mom nodded. "There is a lot you need to learn and not a lot of time." Serious, she said. "School starts again in a few weeks and you will be enrolled with your sister."

You moaned at that as Kelly giggled before a nurse entered with a wheelchair. "It is time, Miss Moore." Calmly, she said.

You sighed, rolling your eyes and sat in the wheelchair to be taken to the family car...
115321.title: next day

123.content:
You wake up and find a man sat next to the bed, he looks in his mid 30s, hello you say confused.

Hello Naomi, how are you feeling after the accident, fine, what accident.

You presume the way he's talking to you he's your father, I'm fine dad.

He then hands you your sister, who is two months old, you rub your chest and your father suggest that you feed Zara, what? The doctor said you may suffer from amnesia.

Right you 16, you already know your name, well your mother died in child birth and since then you've taken full responsibility of raising Zara.

Your natural instincts kicked in and you start producing milk for her, so you feed her, wake up with her and love her like your mother would have.

We live in a one bedroomed flat, it's big but still one bedroomed, so we all share the room.

You take Zara and although nervous begin to feed Zara which infact gives so relief from you aching breast.

Your father leave, but gives Zara to you to look after, you get released from hospital a few days later, having got into a routine with Zara now.

You get back home enter the bed room and see?

choices: You sit up and talk to him
He wants a sibling for Zara
1231.content:
You walk into the bedroom and immediately see a double bed and at the side of it a small crib and apart from a chest of drawers and a wardrobe that's it and you still have plenty of room to move around.

You you feed Zara and put her down to sleep and then continue exploring the flat.

You walk into the kitchen and notice it's big it has a breakfast bar and dining table plus a big oven, dish washer, washer/dryer and i big fridge/freezer all top brands.

The next room is the living room and again the same thing it's big but cosy filled with top brands big TV and a nice sofa set.

Then the last room is the bathroom you walk in and the tiles are maroon and black it has under floor heating and a Jacuzzi style size bath with a shower just to the side of it.

You check on Zara one last time grabbed a baby monitor and went to get a bath as you feel like you need one.

You start filling the bath up and go back into the bedroom and grab a black cotton nightie and some knickers then you wait and eventually get into the bath.

You relax and enjoy your bath then you get out an hour or so later after shaving and doing what you need to do and make your way into the bedroom and get into bed.

You fall asleep at some point and wake up when your father comes back from work and gets into bed with you and kissed you.

What now...
1231.title: A cot and a double bed?

info.brief_description: You're a guy who wakes up in thr hospital as a girl.
info.description:
This is based in my "magic book" interactive story.

But this story takes place in another world.
You're a 25 year old guy named Kevin, you have a 13 years old sister named Kelly.

One day you wake up in the hospital, but you discover you're not yourself. Because you now have the body of a girl
